code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import UpdateShopItem from'../Components/UpdateShopItem';import{upShopItem as _upShopItem}from'../redux/actions/updateShopItem';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{user:state.user,userShopList:state.userShopList};};var mapStateToDispatch=function mapStateToDispatch(dispatch){return{upShopItem:function upShopItem(user,pass,itemId,quantity,item){return dispatch(_upShopItem(user,pass,itemId,quantity,item));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapStateToDispatch)(UpdateShopItem);
